name: Jump and run (Bley)
description:
I made this game to test out coding by myself on a new language (C#) and godot itself.

The only objective of the game is getting to the end as fast as possible.

Keyboard/mouse support

Controller partially supported

The game is not as polished as it could have been, but I was tired since the game didn't have a clear direction. This resulted on making the game more a proof of concept than anything else.
